name: Wake Up Alice, Wake Up
description:
Game Description

You are Alice who just woke up to the sound of someone calling you. 

Follow the rabbit and solve the problem.

Game Play

Point and Click Game.

Information/Eat Button to see or use the item.

There is a lantern to light up.

Bug

In stage 2, there are some bugs. So wait a few seconds to load everything okay.

After this jam, I'll fix this problem.
